alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 5:40PM CDT until March 14 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Collin County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 539 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wylie, moving northeast at 45 mph. A second storm is located north of Frisco and south of Prosper. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plano, McKinney, Frisco, Richardson, Allen, Wylie, Sachse, Murphy, Prosper, Anna, Fairview, Princeton, Celina, Lucas, Parker, Farmersville, Van Alstyne, Lowry Crossing, Melissa and Lavon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
